viewtier.ui
Class Layout

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--viewtier.ui.Layout
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
public final class Layout
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

Layout defines layout of a component within a container.
Default layout values are Horisontal position - 1 Vertical position - Layout.RELATIVE Horisontal position - 1 Vertical position - Layout.RELATIVE Horisontal alignment - Layout.LEFT Vertical alignment - Layout.CENTER Horisontal span - 1 Vertical span - 1

See Also:
